## Guardrail Compliance

I confirm this PR does **NOT**:

- [ ] Create new investigative powers
- [ ] Introduce bulk data ingestion
- [ ] Introduce biometric scraping, facial recognition, or watchlists
- [ ] Introduce risk scoring, individual profiling, or predictive policing/arrest modeling
- [ ] Introduce mass surveillance or community monitoring
- [ ] Introduce automated referral to law enforcement without human validation
- [ ] Introduce automated enforcement actions
- [ ] Remove or weaken mandatory human-in-the-loop requirements
- [ ] Reduce survivor governance authority or consent protections
- [ ] Violate any constraint listed in `README.md` under "What it is not (binding constraints)"
- [ ] Introduce evidentiary media ingestion, storage, or management
- [ ] Introduce cross-linkage of intake streams by default
